sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import PageTitle from '../../components/layout/PageTitle' import SectionTitle from '../../components/layout/SectionTitle' import DataContext from '../../data/DataContext' import { AppContext } from '../../data/Store' const UseContext = (props) => { const { state, setState } = useContext(DataContext) function addNumber(delta) { setState({ ...state, number: state.number + delta }) } const { number, text, setNumber } = useContext(AppContext) useEffect(function() { if(number > 1250) { setText('Eita!') } }, [number]) return (
{state.text} {state.number}
{text} {number}
) } export default UseContext
